casebody.data:
STATE
v.
AUGUSTINE, GOLPHIN, AND WALTERS. No. 139PA13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, for Augustine, Quintel, et al.

Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr.

James E. Ferguson, II, Charlotte, for Augustine, Quintel, et al. Cassandra Stubbs, for Augustine, Quintel, et al. William P. Hart, Sr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Robert P. Mosteller, for Retired Members of the North Carolina Judiciary. James Patrick Longest, Jr., for North Carolina State Conference of the NAACP. Irving Joyner, for North Carolina State Conference of the NAACP. Theresa A. Newman, for North Carolina State Conference of the NAACP. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of January 2014 by Defendants to Strike:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."

Beasley, and Ervin, J. recused.
